PerfectNetExp.abs: 甲龙亚目 Ankylosauria甲胄鱼类 ostracoderm假齿菊石式缝合线 pseudoceratitic suture
25 亿年奥陶纪地层中的甲胄鱼(Ostracoderm)化石〔2〕,但鱼类何时、何地、由什么样的动物进化而来,至今仍具模糊性。多数学者认为,鱼类是由原始的有头类进化而来.

list.abs: ostium 小孔ostracoderms 甲青鱼类ostrone 雌酮
...其中叶鳞鱼属(Phyllolepis)是失去大部头甲的特化鱼类。以前被当作甲胄鱼类(ostracoderms)。褶齿鱼类(ptyctodonts)与节颈鱼类近缘.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from modern Latin Ostracodermi (former taxonomic name), from Greek ostrakon 'shell' + derma 'skin'

means.word_mean: 1. extinct fishlike jawless vertebrate having a heavily armored body; of the Paleozoic
